sql.statement: SELECT '',ACCOUNT,Description,ParentAccount FROM ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT=?
SELECT '',ACCOUNT,Description,ParentAccount FROM ACCOUNT
SELECT ACCOUNT FROM ACCOUNT ORDER BY ACCOUNT DESC
SELECT '',EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,MANAGEMENT_LEVEL,ADDR,CONTACT_NO,JOIN_DATE,RESIGN_DATE,SALARY_PERCENTAGE,SALARY_AMOUNT,SALARY_TYPE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID=?
SELECT '',EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,MANAGEMENT_LEVEL,ADDR,CONTACT_NO,JOIN_DATE,RESIGN_DATE,SALARY_PERCENTAGE,SALARY_AMOUNT,SALARY_TYPE FROM EMPLOYEE
SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID FROM EMPLOYEE ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_ID DESC
SELECT '',MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_NAME,MEMBER_CATEGORY,ADDR,CONTACT_NO FROM MEMBER
SELECT '',MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_NAME,MEMBER_CATEGORY,ADDR,CONTACT_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=?
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBER_ID DESC
SELECT '',SUPPLIER_ID,SUPPLIER_NAME,ADDR,CONTACT_NO,PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD FROM SUPPLIER
SELECT '',SUPPLIER_ID,SUPPLIER_NAME,ADDR,CONTACT_NO,PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD FROM SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_ID=?
SELECT SUPPLIER_ID FROM SUPPLIER ORDER BY SUPPLIER_ID DESC
SELECT '',AGENT_ID,AGENT_NAME,ADDR,CONTACT_NO,AGENFEE_PERCENTAGE FROM AGENT
SELECT '',AGENT_ID,AGENT_NAME,ADDR,CONTACT_NO,AGENFEE_PERCENTAGE FROM AGENT
SELECT AGENT_ID FROM AGENT ORDER BY AGENT_ID DESC
SELECT '',BANK_ID,BANK_NAME,BANK_ACCOUNT,BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME FROM BANK
SELECT '',BANK_ID,BANK_NAME,BANK_ACCOUNT,BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME FROM BANK WHERE BANK_ID=?
SELECT BANK_ID FROM BANK ORDER BY BANK_ID DESC

SELECT '',ITEM_ID,ITEM_DESC,CATEGORY,QUANTITY,UNIT_TYPE,REPORT_UNIT_TYPE,VOLUME_PER_UNIT,PURCHASE_PRICE_PER_UNIT,SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT_1,SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT_2,SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT_3,SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT_4,MINIMUM_STOCK FROM ITEM

SELECT '',ITEM_ID,ITEM_DESC,CATEGORY,QUANTITY,UNIT_TYPE,REPORT_UNIT_TYPE,VOLUME_PER_UNIT,PURCHASE_PRICE_PER_UNIT,SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT_1,SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT_2,SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT_3,SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT_4,MINIMUM_STOCK FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_ID=?
SELECT ITEM_ID FROM ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_ID DESC
SELECT TREATMENT_ID,TREATMENT_NAME FROM TREATMENT
SELECT TREATMENT_ID FROM TREATMENT ORDER BY TREATMENT_ID DESC
SELECT TREATMENT_ID, TREATMENT_NAME FROM TREATMENT WHERE TREATMENT_ID=?
SELECT '',TREATMENT_ITEMS_ID,TREATMENT_ID,ITEM_ID,QUANTITY,PURCHASE_PRICE_PER_UNIT,SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT FROM TREATMENT_ITEMS
SELECT TREATMENT_ITEMS_ID FROM TREATMENT_ITEMS ORDER BY TREATMENT_ITEMS_ID DESC
SELECT TI.ITEM_ID, I.ITEM_DESC, TI.QUANTITY, TI.PURCHASE_PRICE_PER_UNIT, TI.SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT FROM TREATMENT_ITEMS TI JOIN ITEM I ON TI.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID WHERE TI.TREATMENT_ID=?
SELECT CARD_ID,CARD_NAME,CATEGORY,CARD_VALUE,PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD,DUE_DATE_TYPE FROM CARDS
SELECT CARD_ID FROM CARDS ORDER BY CARD_ID DESC
SELECT CARD_ID,CARD_NAME,CATEGORY,CARD_VALUE,PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD,DUE_DATE_TYPE FROM CARDS WHERE CARD_ID=?
SELECT '',CARD_ALLOWED_ITEM_ID,CARD_ID,ITEM_ID,DISC_PERCENTAGE FROM CARD_ALLOWED_ITEM
SELECT CARD_ALLOWED_ITEM_ID FROM CARD_ALLOWED_ITEM ORDER BY CARD_ALLOWED_ITEM_ID DESC
SELECT CAI.ITEM_ID, I.ITEM_DESC, CAI.DISC_PERCENTAGE FROM CARD_ALLOWED_ITEM CAI JOIN ITEM I ON CAI.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID WHERE CAI.CARD_ID=?
SELECT '',CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT_RECORD_ID,CARD_ID,TREATMENT_ID FROM CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT
SELECT CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT_RECORD_ID FROM CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT ORDER BY CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT_RECORD_ID DESC
SELECT CAT.TREATMENT_ID, T.TREATMENT_NAME, CAT.SALES_PRICE, CAT.DISC_PERCENTAGE FROM CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT CAT JOIN TREATMENT T ON CAT.TREATMENT_ID = T.TREATMENT_ID WHERE CAT.CARD_ID=?
SELECT CARD_PACKAGE_ID,DESCRIPTIONS,MEMBER_CATEGORY,PRICE FROM CARD_PACKAGE
SELECT CARD_PACKAGE_ID FROM CARD_PACKAGE ORDER BY CARD_PACKAGE_ID DESC
SELECT CARD_PACKAGE_ID,DESCRIPTIONS,MEMBER_CATEGORY,PRICE FROM CARD_PACKAGE WHERE CARD_PACKAGE_ID=?
SELECT '',CARD_PACKAGE_DETAIL_ID,CARD_PACKAGE_ID,CARD_ID,QUANTITY FROM CARD_PACKAGE_DETAIL
SELECT CARD_PACKAGE_DETAIL_ID FROM CARD_PACKAGE_DETAIL ORDER BY CARD_PACKAGE_DETAIL_ID DESC
SELECT CPD.CARD_ID, C.CARD_NAME, CPD.QUANTITY FROM CARD_PACKAGE_DETAIL CPD JOIN CARDS C ON CPD.CARD_ID = C.CARD_ID WHERE CPD.CARD_PACKAGE_ID=?

SELECT DISTINCT dbo.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, dbo.MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME, dbo.MEMBER.Birthdate, dbo.MEMBER.CONTACT_NO, balance, dbo.SALES_DETAILS_CARD.VOUCHER_NO,CATEGORY,SALES_DETAILS_CARD.CARD_ID ,card_name FROM dbo.MEMBER left outer JOIN dbo.SALES ON dbo.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = dbo.SALES.MEMBER_ID left outer JOIN dbo.SALES_DETAILS_CARD ON dbo.SALES.SALES_ID = dbo.SALES_DETAILS_CARD.SALES_ID left outer JOIN dbo.CARDS ON dbo.CARDS.CARD_ID = dbo.SALES_DETAILS_CARD.CARD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.VTRX_MEMBERBALANCE ON dbo.VTRX_MEMBERBALANCE.MEMBER_ID = dbo.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID WHERE ( (dbo.SALES_DETAILS_CARD.USING_DATE IS NULL) AND (dbo.SALES_DETAILS_CARD.EXPIRED_DATE IS NULL) OR (dbo.SALES_DETAILS_CARD.USING_DATE IS NULL) AND (dbo.SALES_DETAILS_CARD.EXPIRED_DATE >= GETDATE()) AND (dbo.SALES_DETAILS_CARD.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= GETDATE())) and (MEMBER_NAME LIKE ? OR SALES_DETAILS_CARD.VOUCHER_NO LIKE ? OR CONVERT(varchar,birthdate,105) LIKE ? OR CONTACT_NO LIKE ?) ORDER BY MEMBER.MEMBER_ID,CATEGORY
SELECT DISTINCT dbo.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, dbo.MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME, dbo.MEMBER.Birthdate, dbo.MEMBER.CONTACT_NO FROM MEMBER

SELECT DISTINCT dbo.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, dbo.MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME, dbo.MEMBER.Birthdate, dbo.MEMBER.CONTACT_NO FROM MEMBER left outer join VTRX_CARDMEMBER ON VTRX_CARDMEMBER.MEMBER_ID=MEMBER.MEMBER_ID WHERE (MEMBER_NAME LIKE ? OR VOUCHER_NO LIKE ? OR CONVERT(varchar,birthdate,105) LIKE ? OR CONTACT_NO LIKE ?)
SELECT MAX(SUBSTRING([MEMBER_ID],2,LEN(MEMBER_ID)-1)) FROM member

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE],SALES.[MEMBER_ID],member_name,[CARD_ID] ,[REMARK],[TOTAL_PRICE] FROM [SALES] left outer JOIN VTRX_SALES ON SALES.SALES_ID=VTRX_SALES.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id where month(SALES_DATE)=? and year(SALES_DATE)=?

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE],SALES.[MEMBER_ID],member_name,[CARD_ID] ,[REMARK],[TOTAL_PRICE] FROM [SALES] left outer JOIN VTRX_SALES ON SALES.SALES_ID=VTRX_SALES.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id where SALES_DATE >=?

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE],SALES.[MEMBER_ID],member_name,[CARD_ID] ,[REMARK],[TOTAL_PRICE] FROM [SALES] left outer JOIN VTRX_SALES ON SALES.SALES_ID=VTRX_SALES.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id where SALES_DATE <=?

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE],SALES.[MEMBER_ID],member_name,[CARD_ID] ,[REMARK],[TOTAL_PRICE] FROM [SALES] left outer JOIN VTRX_SALES ON SALES.SALES_ID=VTRX_SALES.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id where SALES_DATE >=? AND SALES_DATE <=?

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE],SALES.[MEMBER_ID],member_name,[CARD_ID] ,[REMARK],[TOTAL_PRICE] FROM [SALES] left outer JOIN VTRX_SALES ON SALES.SALES_ID=VTRX_SALES.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id where SALES.MEMBER_ID=?

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE],SALES.[MEMBER_ID],member_name,[CARD_ID] ,[REMARK] ,[TOTAL_PRICE] FROM [SALES] left outer JOIN VTRX_SALES ON SALES.SALES_ID=VTRX_SALES.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id where SALES.sales_id=?

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE],SALES.[MEMBER_ID],member_name,[CARD_ID] ,[REMARK] ,[TOTAL_PRICE] FROM [SALES] left outer JOIN VTRX_SALES ON SALES.SALES_ID=VTRX_SALES.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id where member_name LIKE ?

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE],SALES.[MEMBER_ID],member_name,[CARD_ID] ,[REMARK] ,[TOTAL_PRICE] FROM [SALES] left outer JOIN VTRX_SALES ON SALES.SALES_ID=VTRX_SALES.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id where CONTACT_NO LIKE ?

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE],SALES.[MEMBER_ID],member_name,SALES.[CARD_ID] ,[REMARK] ,[TOTAL_PRICE] FROM [SALES] left outer JOIN VTRX_SALES ON SALES.SALES_ID=VTRX_SALES.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id inner join SALES_DETAILS_CARD on SALES_DETAILS_CARD.sales_id=sales.sales_id where SALES_DETAILS_CARD.voucher_no = ?

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE] ,SALES.[MEMBER_ID],SALES.[AGENT_ID],SALES.[CARD_ID],[TOTAL_PRICE],[TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT], [REMARK],member_name ,agent_name,card_name,voucher_no,SALES.[CARD_PACKAGE_ID],descriptions,card_package.PRICE,CARDS.CARD_VALUE,member.contact_no,SALES.BANK_ID,BANK_NAME FROM [SALES] inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id left outer join card_package on card_package.card_package_id=sales.card_package_id left outer join agent on SALES.agent_id=agent.agent_id left outer join cards on cards.card_id=sales.card_id LEFT OUTER JOIN BANK ON BANK.BANK_ID=SALES.BANK_ID where SALES.sales_id=?

SELECT [SALES_DETAILS_ITEM_ID] ,A.[ITEM_ID],ITEM_desc,a.[QUANTITY] ,[UNIT_VALUE] ,a.[QUANTITY]*[UNIT_VALUE],DISC_PCT,(DISC_PCT)*a.[QUANTITY]*[UNIT_VALUE]/100 FROM [SALES_DETAILS_ITEM] A INNER JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_ID=B.ITEM_ID where [SALES_ID]=?

SELECT [SALES_DETAILS_CARD_ID],A.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[VOUCHER_NO],a.[CARD_VALUE],a.[TOPUP_PRICE],[USING_DATE],[EFFECTIVE_DATE],[EXPIRED_DATE] FROM [SALES_DETAILS_CARD] A INNER JOIN CARDS B ON A.CARD_ID=B.CARD_ID where [SALES_ID]=? order by [EFFECTIVE_DATE]

SELECT [SALES_DETAILS_TREATMENT_ID],A.[TREATMENT_ID],TREATMENT_name ,a.QUANTITY,[UNIT_VALUE] ,a.QUANTITY*[UNIT_VALUE],d.employee_id,employee_name,A.disc_pct,a.QUANTITY*[UNIT_VALUE]*A.disc_pct/100 FROM [SALES_DETAILS_TREATMENT] A INNER JOIN TREATMENT B ON A.TREATMENT_ID=B.TREATMENT_ID INNER JOIN TREATMENT_RECORD C on A.sales_id=C.sales_id inner join TREATMENT_RECORD_detail D on D.treatment_id=A.treatment_id and D.TREATMENT_RECORD_id=C.TREATMENT_RECORD_id left outer join employee e on e.employee_id=d.employee_id where A.sales_id=?
SELECT [id],[des],[price],QTY,[tot] FROM [VTRX_SALESDETAIL] WHERE [SALES_ID]=?
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM [MEMBER] WHERE CONTACT_NO=?
SELECT BALANCE FROM [VTRX_MEMBERBALANCE] WHERE MEMBER_ID=?

SELECT distinct [VTRX_CARDMEMBER].[CARD_ID],card_name,VOUCHER_NO,VTRX_CARDMEMBER.member_id,member_name,contact_no,cards.category FROM [VTRX_CARDMEMBER] inner join cards on vtrx_cardmember.card_id=cards.card_id inner join member on member.member_id=VTRX_CARDMEMBER.member_id where VTRX_CARDMEMBER.[MEMBER_ID]=? and [VTRX_CARDMEMBER].[CARD_ID]=?
SELECT ITEM_ID,disc_percentage FROM [CARD_ALLOWED_ITEM] WHERE CARD_ID=?
SELECT [TREATMENT_ID] FROM [CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT] WHERE CARD_ID=?
SELECT [CATEGORY],[CARD_VALUE] FROM [CARDS] WHERE [CARD_ID]=?
SELECT [ITEM_ID],[ITEM_DESC],[QUANTITY],[MINIMUM_STOCK] FROM [ITEM] where QUANTITY < MINIMUM_STOCK

SELECT [BOOKING_ID],BOOKING.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,MEMBER.CONTACT_NO,BOOKING.[TREATMENT_ID],TREATMENT_NAME,BOOKING.[EMPLOYEE_ID],EMPLOYEE_NAME,[BOOKED_DATE] FROM [BOOKING] INNER JOIN TREATMENT ON BOOKING.TREATMENT_ID=TREATMENT.TREATMENT_ID INNER JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID=BOOKING.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE ON EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_ID=BOOKING.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE booked_date-7 < getdate()
SELECT ITEM_ID,ITEM_desc FROM ITEM
SELECT [TREATMENT_ID],TREATMENT_name FROM [TREATMENT]
SELECT [TREATMENT].[TREATMENT_ID],[TREATMENT_name],SALES_PRICE,0 FROM [TREATMENT]

SELECT [CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT].[TREATMENT_ID],TREATMENT_name,CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT.SALES_PRICE,case when disc_percentage is null then 0 else disc_percentage end FROM CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT inner join TREATMENT on TREATMENT.treatment_id=CARD_ALLOWED_TREATMENT.treatment_id WHERE CARD_ID=?
SELECT [CARD_ID],[CARD_NAME],[CATEGORY],[CARD_VALUE] ,[PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD],[DUE_DATE_TYPE] FROM [CARDS]

SELECT '',a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,CATEGORY,CARD_VALUE,PRICE,PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD,DUE_DATE_TYPE,[QUANTITY] FROM [CARD_PACKAGE_DETAIL] a inner join card_package c on a.CARD_PACKAGE_ID=c.CARD_PACKAGE_ID join cards b on a.CARD_ID=b.CARD_ID where c.[CARD_PACKAGE_ID]=?
SELECT SUBSTRING(sales_id, 5, len(Rtrim(sales_id))-4) AS ExtractString,sales_id from sales where sales_id like ? order by sales_id desc
SELECT max(CONVERT(INT, TREATMENT_RECORD_id) )+1 from treatment_record

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],[SALES_ID],a.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[REMARK],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE a.[MEMBER_ID] in (select MEMBER_ID from sales where MONTH(sales_DATE)=? AND YEAR(sales_DATE)=?)

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],[SALES_ID],a.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[REMARK],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE a.[MEMBER_ID] in (select MEMBER_ID from sales where sales_DATE >=?)

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],[SALES_ID],a.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[REMARK],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE a.[MEMBER_ID] in (select MEMBER_ID from sales where sales_DATE <=?)

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],[SALES_ID],a.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[REMARK],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE a.[MEMBER_ID] in (select MEMBER_ID from sales where sales_DATE >=? and sales_DATE <=?)

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],[SALES_ID],a.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[REMARK],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE a.[MEMBER_ID] =?

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],[SALES_ID],a.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[REMARK],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE a.[MEMBER_ID] in (select MEMBER_ID from sales where SALES_ID=?)

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],[SALES_ID],a.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[REMARK],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE MEMBER_NAME LIKE ?

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],[SALES_ID],a.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[REMARK],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE b.contact_no LIKE ?

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],[SALES_ID],a.[MEMBER_ID],MEMBER_NAME,a.[CARD_ID],CARD_NAME,[REMARK],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE a.voucher_no = ?

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL_ID,A.TREATMENT_ID,TREATMENT_NAME,A.EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,COST,B.SALES_PRICE FROM TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL A INNER JOIN TREATMENT B ON A.TREATMENT_ID=B.TREATMENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN VMST_TREATMENTPACKAGE C ON A.TREATMENT_ID=C.TREATMENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE D ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID=D.EMPLOYEE_ID

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],a.[MEMBER_ID],[SALES_ID],a.[CARD_ID],[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST],[REMARK],MEMBER_NAME,CARD_NAME,a.voucher_no,TOTAL_DISC FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID]= ?

SELECT TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL_ID,A.TREATMENT_ID,TREATMENT_NAME,A.EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,A.quantity,A.PRICE,A.quantity*A.PRICE,A.DISC_PCT,A.quantity*A.PRICE*A.DISC_PCT/100 FROM TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL A INNER JOIN TREATMENT B ON A.TREATMENT_ID=B.TREATMENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE D ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID=D.EMPLOYEE_ID where [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID]=?
SELECT [DT],[REMARK],[INBALANCE],[OUTBALANCE] FROM [VTRX_MEMBERHISTORY] WHERE [MEMBER_ID]=? ORDER BY DT,TP

SELECt member_name,sales.[SALES_ID],sales_date,SALES_DETAILS_CARD.[CARD_ID],card_name,SALES_DETAILS_CARD.[VOUCHER_NO],SALES_DETAILS_CARD.[CARD_VALUE],Expired_DATE FROM [SALES_DETAILS_CARD] inner join sales on sales.SALES_ID=SALES_DETAILS_CARD.SALES_ID inner join member on member.member_id=sales.member_id inner join cards on cards.card_id=SALES_DETAILS_CARD.CARD_ID where ([EFFECTIVE_DATE]>=getdate() or [EFFECTIVE_DATE] is null) and using_date is null and sales.member_id=? order by effective_date

SELECT treatment_date AS DT, treatment_name AS remark, TOTAL_TREATMENT AS VALUE FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL] INNER JOIN TREATMENT_RECORD ON [TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL].TREATMENT_RECORD_ID = TREATMENT_RECORD.TREATMENT_RECORD_ID INNER JOIN treatment ON [TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL].TREATMENT_ID = treatment.TREATMENT_ID inner join CARDS ON cards.CARD_ID = TREATMENT_RECORD.CARD_ID AND CARDS.CATEGORY = 'F' WHERE TREATMENT_RECORD.member_id=? ORDER BY TREATMENT_DATE

SELECT dbo.SALES.SALES_DATE AS DT, SALES_ID,REMARK, CARD_NAME, dbo.SALES.TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT AS VALUE,TOTAL_PRICE+TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT AS GROSS,TOTAL_PRICE AS NET FROM dbo.SALES INNER JOIN dbo.CARDS ON dbo.CARDS.CARD_ID = dbo.SALES.CARD_ID AND CARDS.CATEGORY IN ('OUV','D') WHERE dbo.SALES.MEMBER_ID=? ORDER BY SALES_DATE
SELECT SUPPLIER_ID FROM [SUPPLIER] WHERE CONTACT_NO=?
SELECT SUBSTRING(purchase_id, 6, len(Rtrim(purchase_id))-5) AS ExtractString,purchase_id from purchase where purchase_id like ? order by purchase_id desc

SELECT [PURCHASE_ID],[PURCHASE_DATE],PURCHASE.[SUPPLIER_ID],SUPPLIER_NAME,PURCHASE.BANK_ID+'('+BANK_NAME+')',REMARK,[TOTAL_PURCHASE_PRICE] FROM [PURCHASE] INNER JOIN SUPPLIER ON SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=PURCHASE.SUPPLIER_ID left outer join bank on bank.bank_id=purchase.bank_id WHERE MONTH(PURCHASE_DATE)=? AND YEAR(PURCHASE_DATE)=?

SELECT [PURCHASE_ID],[PURCHASE_DATE],PURCHASE.[SUPPLIER_ID],SUPPLIER_NAME,PURCHASE.BANK_ID +'('+BANK_NAME+')',REMARK,[TOTAL_PURCHASE_PRICE] FROM [PURCHASE] INNER JOIN SUPPLIER ON SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=PURCHASE.SUPPLIER_ID left outer join bank on bank.bank_id=purchase.bank_id WHERE PURCHASE_DATE >=?

SELECT [PURCHASE_ID],[PURCHASE_DATE],PURCHASE.[SUPPLIER_ID],SUPPLIER_NAME,PURCHASE.BANK_ID+'('+BANK_NAME+')',REMARK,[TOTAL_PURCHASE_PRICE] FROM [PURCHASE] INNER JOIN SUPPLIER ON SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=PURCHASE.SUPPLIER_ID left outer join bank on bank.bank_id=purchase.bank_id WHERE PURCHASE_DATE <=?

SELECT [PURCHASE_ID],[PURCHASE_DATE],PURCHASE.[SUPPLIER_ID],SUPPLIER_NAME,PURCHASE.BANK_ID+'('+BANK_NAME+')',REMARK,[TOTAL_PURCHASE_PRICE] FROM [PURCHASE] INNER JOIN SUPPLIER ON SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=PURCHASE.SUPPLIER_ID left outer join bank on bank.bank_id=purchase.bank_id WHERE PURCHASE_DATE >=? AND PURCHASE_DATE <=?

SELECT [PURCHASE_ID],[PURCHASE_DATE],PURCHASE.[SUPPLIER_ID],SUPPLIER_NAME,PURCHASE.BANK_ID+'('+BANK_NAME+')',REMARK,[TOTAL_PURCHASE_PRICE] FROM [PURCHASE] INNER JOIN SUPPLIER ON SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=PURCHASE.SUPPLIER_ID left outer join bank on bank.bank_id=purchase.bank_id WHERE purchase.supplier_id=?

SELECT [PURCHASE_ID],[PURCHASE_DATE],PURCHASE.[SUPPLIER_ID],SUPPLIER_NAME,PURCHASE.BANK_ID +'('+BANK_NAME+')',REMARK,[TOTAL_PURCHASE_PRICE] FROM [PURCHASE] INNER JOIN SUPPLIER ON SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=PURCHASE.SUPPLIER_ID left outer join bank on bank.bank_id=purchase.bank_id WHERE supplier_name like ?

SELECT [PURCHASE_ID],[PURCHASE_DATE],PURCHASE.[SUPPLIER_ID],SUPPLIER_NAME,PURCHASE.BANK_ID +'('+BANK_NAME+')',REMARK,[TOTAL_PURCHASE_PRICE] FROM [PURCHASE] INNER JOIN SUPPLIER ON SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=PURCHASE.SUPPLIER_ID left outer join bank on bank.bank_id=purchase.bank_id WHERE purchase.bank_id=?

SELECT [PURCHASE_ID],[PURCHASE_DATE],PURCHASE.[SUPPLIER_ID],PURCHASE.BANK_ID,[TOTAL_PURCHASE_PRICE],[TOTAL_COST_PRICE],[TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT],REMARK,SUPPLIER_NAME ,BANK_NAME,[PAYMENT_DUE_DATE] ,[paiddate],CONTACT_NO FROM [PURCHASE] INNER JOIN SUPPLIER ON SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=PURCHASE.SUPPLIER_ID left outer join bank on bank.bank_id=purchase.bank_id WHERE PURCHASE_ID=?

select PURCHASE_DETAIL_ID, PURCHASE_DETAIL.ITEM_ID,ITEM_DESC,PURCHASE_DETAIL.QUANTITY ,QUANTITYSTOCK,PURCHASE_DETAIL.PURCHASE_PRICE,DISCOUNT_AMOUNT from purchase_detail INNER JOIN ITEM ON PURCHASE_DETAIL.ITEM_ID=ITEM.ITEM_ID where purchase_id=?
SELECT [ITEM_ID],[VOLUME_PER_UNIT] FROM [ITEM]
SELECT MAX(SUBSTRING([PURCHASE_ID],2,LEN(PURCHASE_ID)-1)) FROM PURCHASE
SELECT [Bank_ID],BANK_NAME FROM [BANK]
SELECT [Bank],[CREDIT],[DEBIT] FROM [VTRX_BANKCASH] WHERE (([MTH]<=? AND [YR]<=?) or yr < ?) and Bank=?
SELECT [TrxDate],[Seq],[Bank],[Credit],[Debit],[TrxType],[refcode],[Remarks] FROM [BankCash] WHERE MONTH(TRXDATE)=? AND YEAR(TRXDATE)=? and Bank=?
SELECT sum([Debit]),sum([Credit]),noteheader,paymeth,TRXTYPE FROM [bankcash] where BANK=CONVERT(varchar(256),?) and trxdate=? and refcode=? group by noteheader,PAYMETH,TRXTYPE

SELECT SEQ,Acct,description,remarks,[Credit],refno FROM [BankCash] left outer join account on account.account=bankcash.acct where BANK=CONVERT(varchar(256),?) and trxdate=? and refcode=? order by [seq]

SELECT SEQ,Acct,description,remarks,[Debit],refno FROM [BankCash] left outer join account on account.account=bankcash.acct where BANK=CONVERT(varchar(256),?) and trxdate=? and refcode=? order by [seq]
SELECT MAX(SEQ)+1 as sq FROM BankCash where BANK=CONVERT(varchar(256),?) and trxdate=?

SELECT [TrxDate],[Seq],[ACCT],DESCRIPTION,REMARKS,[Credit],[Debit],[TrxType],[refcode] FROM [BankCash] LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCOUNT ON ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT=BANKCASH.ACCT WHERE MONTH(TRXDATE)=? AND YEAR(TRXDATE)=? and Bank=? ORDER BY [TrxDate],[Seq]

SELECT ITEM.[ITEM_ID],[ITEM_DESC],[CATEGORY],item.quantity,VMST_ITEM.[QUANTITY],[VOLUME_PER_UNIT],[PURCHASE_PRICE_PER_UNIT],[SALES_PRICE_PER_UNIT_1],[MINIMUM_STOCK] FROM [ITEM] left outer join [VMST_ITEM] on VMST_ITEM.item_id=item.item_id

SELECT [PURCHASE_ID],[PURCHASE_DATE],[PURCHASE].[SUPPLIER_ID],SUPPLIER_NAME,[TOTAL_PURCHASE_PRICE],[TOTAL_COST_PRICE],[TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT],[PAYMENT_DUE_DATE],[REMARK],[BANK_ID],[paiddate] FROM [PURCHASE] inner join SUPPLIER on SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=PURCHASE.SUPPLIER_ID where month(purchase_date)=? and year(purchase_date)=?

SELECT VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.YR,VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.MTH,TOTALsales ,CASE WHEN AGENTFEE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE AGENTFEE END AS F,CASE WHEN COMMISION IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COMMISION END AS C,MATERIALITEM,MATERIALCOST,TOTALsales-MATERIALITEM-MATERIALCOST-(CASE WHEN AGENTFEE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE AGENTFEE END )-COMMISION FROM VTRX_MONTHLYSALES left outer join vtrx_MONTHLYagentfee on VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.YR=vtrx_MONTHLYagentfee.YR AND VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.MTH=vtrx_MONTHLYagentfee.MTH left outer join VTRX_MONTHLYCOSTMATERIAL on VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.YR=VTRX_MONTHLYCOSTMATERIAL.YR AND VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.MTH=VTRX_MONTHLYCOSTMATERIAL.MTH LEFT OUTER JOIN VTRX_MONTHLYCOMM ON VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.YR=VTRX_MONTHLYCOMM.YR AND VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.MTH=VTRX_MONTHLYCOMM.MTH LEFT OUTER JOIN VTRX_MONTHLYTREATMENTMATERIAL ON VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.YR=VTRX_MONTHLYTREATMENTMATERIAL.YR AND VTRX_MONTHLYSALES.MTH=VTRX_MONTHLYTREATMENTMATERIAL.MTH

SELECT SALES.[SALES_ID],[SALES_DATE] ,MEMBER_NAME ,AGENT_NAME,[TOTAL_PRICE],[TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT], [REMARK],BANK_NAME FROM [SALES] inner join member on member.member_id=[SALES].member_id left outer join card_package on card_package.card_package_id=sales.card_package_id left outer join agent on SALES.agent_id=agent.agent_id left outer join cards on cards.card_id=sales.card_id LEFT OUTER JOIN BANK ON BANK.BANK_ID=SALES.BANK_ID where MONTH(SALES_DATE)=? AND YEAR(SALES_DATE)=?

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_ID],[TREATMENT_DATE],MEMBER_NAME,[SALES_ID],CARD_NAME,a.voucher_no,[TOTAL_TREATMENT],[TOTAL_MATERIAL_COST],TOTAL_DISC,[REMARK] FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD] a inner join member b on a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER join cards c on a.CARD_ID=c.CARD_ID WHERE month(treatment_date)= ? and year(treatment_date)=?

SELECT [AGENT_ID], agent_name,sum(agentfee) FROM [SALES] inner join vtrx_agentfee on [SALES].AGENT_ID=vtrx_agentfee.AGENT_ID inner join agent on agent.agent_id=sales.agent_id where month(sales_date)=? and year(sales_date)=? group by [AGENT_ID], agent_name

SELECT [TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL].[EMPLOYEE_ID],EMPLOYEE_NAME, sum(commision) FROM [TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL] inner join treatment_record on [TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL].TREATMENT_RECORD_ID=treatment_record.TREATMENT_RECORD_ID inner join EMPLOYEE on EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_ID=[TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL].EMPLOYEE_ID inner join vtrx_commisionemployee on vtrx_commisionemployee.employee_id=employee.EMPLOYEE_ID where month(treatment_date)=? and year(treatment_Date)=? group by [TREATMENT_RECORD_DETAIL].[EMPLOYEE_ID],EMPLOYEE_NAME
SELECT [PW],[EMPLOYEE_ID],[EMPLOYEE_NAME],CONTACT_NO,[MANAGEMENT_LEVEL] FROM [EMPLOYEE] where EMPLOYEE_ID=? OR CONTACT_NO=?
